review: We wanted to watch our local college football team but it wasn't televised. It was only on the college's website which we had to watch from my phone. Now we have this we can turn on airplay and it will mirror my phone. It also has tons of apps to choose from. We can watch sports broadcasts that aren't televised on regular cable.

review: The first one I received didn't work correctly. I was so annoyed, but then I was so happy when I could easily return it and have a new one sent to me.  I LOVE AMAZON!The second one I received has worked great for over a year now.  I use it all of the time to watch TV, to push videos, music and pictures from my phone to the screen.  I watch PBS using the special app on the device.I also move this from TV to TV throughout the house so I can watch my Amazon Prime content on different TVs.
